Sequence Information.Target Organism: No MICs found in DRAMP database
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Probably participates in a plant defense mechanism.
Sequence Information.PTM: This is a cyclic peptide which may contain three disulfide bonds 5-19; 9-21; 14-26.

Literature.Title: A novel suite of cyclotides from Viola odorata sequence variation and the implications for structure, function and stability.
Literature.Author: Ireland DC, Colgrave ML, Craik DJ.
